text: Valerianoideae is a subfamily of plants. == Genera == * Centranthus - 12 species * Fedia * Nardostachys - 3 species * Patrinia - 17 species * Plectritis (Seablushes) - 5 species * Valeriana (Valerians) - 125 species * Valerianella (Cornsalads) - 20 species == References == * Complete chloroplast genome sequence of Patrinia saniculifolia hemsl.(Disacales: Caprifoliaceae), an endemic plant in Korea. EH Jung, CE Lim, BY Lee, SP Hong - Mitochondrial DNA Part B, 2018 == External links == * * Category:Asterid subfamilies
title: Valerianoideae
